ques: The news of the accident was absolutely _________; I hope everyone is okay.
She needed to know the _________ time of the meeting.
It's important to treat others with _________y and respect.
The _________ of the company made an important announcement.
Please respect my _________ space and don't enter my room without permission.
I'll have my _________ order at the coffee shop, a latte with extra foam.
The idea of a flying elephant may seem _________.
The view from the mountaintop was absolutely _________.
A _________ investigation was conducted to uncover the truth.
A _________ immune system can help protect against illnesses.
She met with _________ potential clients throughout the day.
The mountain had a _________ slope that made climbing difficult.
The _________ dog chased away intruders from the property.
She had a _________ view of the situation and didn't consider all perspectives.
They offered him a _________ salary for the job.
She is the _________ editor of the newspaper and oversees all content.
The company held a _________ meeting to discuss sensitive matters.
It will take _________ hours to complete the project.
His _________ statement left everyone in the room puzzled.
The price of the car was _________ and out of my budget.
The software has a _________ security system to prevent unauthorized access.
Her performance in the play was truly _________; she received a standing ovation.
The _________ measurements were crucial for the experiment.
She did a _________ job of cleaning the house from top to bottom.
She arrived at the office at her _________ time, 9 a.m.
Their _________ argument resulted in hurtful words and anger.
His _________ity towards certain employees created tension in the office.
His illness has caused him _________ pain and suffering.
The chef prepared a _________ meal that delighted the guests.
The instructions must be followed with _________ precision.
The storm brought _________ winds that caused damage to buildings.
The weather took a _________ turn, with heavy rain and strong winds.
The _________ responsibility of a firefighter is to save lives.
Their _________ routine involved morning walks in the park.
The hotel provided _________ accommodations for the guests.
The book provided a _________ explanation of the scientific concept.
He keeps his personal life very _________ and rarely shares details with others.
The _________ity of the situation made it difficult to take seriously.
He made _________ attempts to solve the puzzle.
The judge declared a _________ verdict in the trial.
The economy showed _________ growth in the past year.
She faced a _________ learning curve when starting her new job.
He described the attack as a _________ and unprovoked assault.
The concert received _________ reviews from music critics.
The _________ investigator was hired to uncover the truth.
The media's _________ coverage of the event led to misunderstandings.
The movie we watched last night was truly _________; the acting was terrible.
She found the story so _________ that she burst into laughter.
He provided the _________ details of the incident.
There are _________ restaurants to choose from in the city.
The _________ hill provided a challenging hike.
She made a _________ effort to help those in need.
She maintains a _________ workout routine to stay healthy.
It's important to be _________ in your research to avoid errors.
The police _________ arrived at the scene of the crime.
It's not the _________ practice to leave work early without notice.
His actions were far from _________ and caused harm to many.
The hotel offered _________ amenities and services to its guests.
The tree's _________ branches could withstand strong winds.
The wild animals in the jungle can be _________ and dangerous.
The decision to paint the sky purple was considered _________ by many.
The team conducted _________ experiments to gather data.
The cost of living in the city is known to be _________.
She had a _________ experience with customer service at that store.
He conducted a _________ examination of the patient's medical history.
The letter was marked as _________ and confidential.
She showed a _________ity for classical music over other genres.
The _________ procedure is to fill out the form and submit it online.
The _________ location of the treasure was a closely guarded secret.
He was promoted to the _________ executive officer of the organization.
